hero.subtitle: For a glamorous appearance of your property

cleaning.title: cleaning
cleaning.body: A well cared-for property and clean rooms can make a major contribution to your companyâ€™s positive image. Why not simply put us in charge of this task?

property.title: Property maintenance
property.body: When it comes to the day-to-day handling of infrastructure a friendly, farsighted and efficient caretaker is indispensable. His all-round capabilities come to the fore in a diverse range of specialist areas, all requiring mutual trust.

green.title: Green areas
green.body: Plants are more than just a feast for the eyes. Simply looking at green plants can help you to relax without becoming tired. Providing loving, professional care is a task we find satisfying and is our top priority.

transport.title: Relocation | Transport
transport.body: We coordinate and plan relocations and transports, carrying them out on schedule and with the greatest care and attention. We have the required know-how and conscientiousness to transport even bulky furniture; fragile materials and valuable items.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: When it comes to the maintenance and management of your property DFS GmbH is the best address. Our company was founded in 2017 and has been continuously growing ever since. We are your competent, reliable partner for interior and exterior cleaning; garden services and plant care; property maintenance and relocation transportation.
mission.message: We look forward to a good working relationship!
